page.title: 16Peterlee Leisure Centre.
page.content:
Our{Leisure Centre}is very big and has {swimming baths}and they are very big, we have a little pool too.
The Leisure Centre has a{roller disco and a{tap dancing club.}It has lots of things that you would enjoy like{Judo and{Karate.
It has a big{hall}where you can play {football and netball.}They also have a {gymnastics club}and lots more things in the Leisure Centre.
They have a{bar}and a{canteen}that sells sweets, drinks and crisps and it has Space Invaders. The Leisure Centre has a{Sauna}and dry{changing rooms}for people who play{tennis}and things like that.
